doc.field: New York University Archives Student Notebook
New York University Archives Student Notebook

This collection consists of one bound volume with handwritten notes in various hands, at least one of which appears to have been a student enrolled at NYU (the notes indicate they document a lecture delivered by an NYU professor, circa 1832). Some clippings and other handwritten notes are laid in.

This collection consists of one bound volume with handwritten notes in various hands, at least one of which appears to have been a student enrolled at NYU (the notes indicate they document a lecture delivered by an NYU professor, circa 1832). Some clippings and other handwritten notes are laid in.
Donated by Gary Glies in October 2022; the accession number associated with this gift is 2022.079.
